channel.title: cache on Software
channel.description: Recent content in cache on Software

item.title: memcached
item.description: connect to memcached server $ telnet localhost 11211 Trying ::1... Trying 127.0.0.1... Connected to localhost. Escape character is '^]'. get key get flag123 set key 設 key “flag123” 值為 1 set flag123 0 86400 1 <= enter 1 <= enter STORED set flag123 0 86400 5 hello STORED set delete key delete flag123 DELETED ref : http://blog.elijaa.org/index.php?post/2010/05/21/Memcached-telnet-command-summary

item.title: Redis
item.description: 介紹 Open source Key-Value 儲存型態 Value 可以是 strings, hashes, lists, sets, ordered sets 運作在 memory, 可用 snapshot 儲存在硬碟 不支援 2 層以上的 hash Install server brew install redis // Mac sudo apt-get install redis-server // Ubuntu Mac 需執行 redis-server 指令才會啟動 client : 只需安裝 redis-tools sudo apt-get install redis-tools Command keys 全部的 key keys * Key 的數量 info keyspace > db0:keys=74415,expires=63940,avg_ttl=306997004 Find prefix string key : ‘queue:’ keys queue:* 刪除 prefix key
